    Classes  
    Classes.Balls  

    • Uses of Ball in Classes

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Ball> GameInformation.getBalls()

      Gets a List of all balls that belong to this game

      Methods in Classes with parameters of type Ball 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GameInformation.addBall(Ball ball)

      Adds a ball to the current game

      Method parameters in Classes with type arguments of type Ball 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GameInformation.addBalls(java.util.List<Ball> balls)

      Adds balls to the current game

      void GameInformation.setBalls(java.util.List<Ball> balls)

      Sets all of the balls that belong to this game

    • Uses of Ball in Classes.Balls

      Subclasses of Ball in Classes.Balls 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CollisionBall
      The CollisionBall class represents a billiard ball which collides with other balls.
      class  ColorBall
      The ColorBall class represents a colored billiard ball.
      class  FrictionBall
      The FrictionBall class represents a billiard ball which slows down when moving.
      class  GravityBall
      The GravityBall class represents a ball being pulled down by gravity.
      class  NumberedBall
      The NumberedBall class represents a billiard ball with a number.
      class  PulsatingBall
      The PulsatingBall class represents a billiard ball which pulsates (in size).
      class  TraceBall
      The TraceBall class represents a billiard ball with a trace behind it.
